boardgame.name: Hero Realms
Hero Realms: Jeu de Deckbuilding
Битвы героев
boardgame.description: Hero Realms is a fantasy-themed deck-building game that is an adaptation of the award-winning Star Realms game. The game includes basic rules for two-player games, along with rules for multiplayer formats such as Free-For-All, Hunter, and Hydra._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player starts the game with a ten-card personal deck containing gold (for buying) and weapons (for combat). You start each turn with a new hand of five cards from your personal deck. When your deck runs out of cards, you shuffle your discard pile into your new deck. An 80-card Market deck is shared by all players, with five cards being revealed from that deck to create the Market Row. As you play, you use gold to buy champion cards and action cards from the Market. These champions and actions can generate large amounts of gold, combat, or other powerful effects. You use combat to attack your opponent and their champions. When you reduce your opponent's score (called health) to zero, you win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Multiple expansions are available for Hero Realms that allow players to start as a particular character (Cleric, Fighter, Ranger, Thief, or Wizard) and fight cooperatively against a Boss, fight Boss decks against one another, or compete in a campaign mode that has you gain experience to work through different levels of missions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Hero Realms is expected to arrive from the Publisher in Q4, 2016. This listing is for the Adventurer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Tier. This includes: You get the game and ALL current expansions! * The Base Game * 5 Character Packs * 2 Boss Decks * Campaign Starter Deck * 12 Year One Promo Cards * Stretch Goals Boss Decks represent mighty adversaries in the world of Hero Realms. Battle several characters at the same time, or pit two Boss Decks against each other for truly epic battles. Play as a deadly dragon or an evil lich. The Campaign Starter Deck contains 55 cards, including three cooperative missions plus items, skills, and gear cards you can use to upgrade your character with experience. Buy in at this level and you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get the base game, 12 year one promo cards, stretch goals, and ALL the current expansions (5 character packs, 2 boss decks, and the campaign starter deck). Note: You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get the base game, character packs, stretch goals, and promo cards in October. The Boss Decks and Campaign Starter Decks will ship separately (estimate January 2017).

This is for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gamer Tier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; from the Kickstarter Campaign.
